Each user can set their sentiment (Bearish/Neutral/Bullish) on any topic. Topics are identified by bytes32 IDs (e.g., keccak256(\"US_POLITICS\")).","events":{"TopicViewUpdated(address,bytes32,uint8,uint64)":{"params":{"sentiment":"The new sentiment value","topicId":"The topic being updated (bytes32 hash)","updatedAt":"Timestamp of the update","user":"The address of the user"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"getTopicView(address,bytes32)":{"details":"Reverts with TopicNotSet if the user has never set a view for this topic","params":{"topicId":"The topic ID to query","user":"The address of the user"},"returns":{"_0":"The user's TopicView for that topic"}},"hasTopicView(address,bytes32)":{"params":{"topicId":"The topic ID to check","user":"The address of the user"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the user has set a view for this topic"}},"setTopicView(bytes32,uint8)":{"params":{"sentiment":"The sentiment value to set","topicId":"The topic ID (e.g., keccak256(\"US_POLITICS\"))"}}},"title":"ViewProfile","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"InvalidSentiment(uint8)":[{"notice":"Thrown when an invalid sentiment value is provided"}],"TopicNotSet(address,bytes32)":[{"notice":"Thrown when trying to read a topic view that hasn't been set"}]},"events":{"TopicViewUpdated(address,bytes32,uint8,uint64)":{"notice":"Emitted when a user updates their sentiment for a topic"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"getTopicView(address,bytes32)":{"notice":"Get a user's view for a specific topic"},"hasTopicView(address,bytes32)":{"notice":"Check if a user has set a view for a specific topic"},"setTopicView(bytes32,uint8)":{"notice":"Set the caller's sentiment for a specific topic"}},"notice":"Stores user topic-level sentiment preferences for the Morning Desk
